abstract: sex offender id 'd as third victim in washington train crash .
article: a sex offender on lifetime supervision for a child-pornography conviction was identified wednesday as the third victim killed when a speeding amtrak train derailed in washington state . benjamin gran , 40 , of auburn , washington , died of multiple traumatic injuries from the massive wreck , the pierce county coroner 's office told the associated press . gran was busted in 2013 after authorities uncovered his friendship with a notorious dutch pedophile , robert mikelsons , who sexually abused at least 86 boys while working at a day care center in amsterdam , and made video recordings of some assaults .

gran -- who met mikelsons through a since-defunct website , boylover . net , and visited him several times -- pleaded guilty to possession of child pornography and served a two-year prison sentence before being released on dec. . 31 , 2015 , records show . a spokeswoman for seattle us attorney annette hayes told the ap that prosecutors were notified about his death on wednesday . gran was one of three passengers killed on amtrak 501 as it made its inaugural , high-speed run between seattle and portland on monday morning . officials have said the train was going 80 mph in a 30 mph zone when it jumped the tracks and plunged off an overpass onto a busy highway below .

the other people killed in the crash were identified tuesday as transit-buff pals jim hamre , 61 , and zack willhoite , 35 . about 100 people , including some traveling on the roadway , were injured .
